description:
Do you want to make the most out of your Facebook marketing budget in 2016? Then it’s time to use a 100% free tool Facebook created for smart marketers like you.

In this course, I’ll show you how to use the latest version of Power Editor like a professional Facebook marketing agency.

You’ll learn proven & tested strategies to improve your marketing and get better results on Facebook almost overnight.

Learn How to Take the Best Seat in The House & Learn Proven Tricks From A Professional Facebook Ad Agency

  • Get more website visitors
  • Increase your reach & conversions
  • Boost your engagement


Contents & Overview

This course will introduce you to Facebook Power Editor, an advanced Facebook ad management tool.

First, we’ll cover why you should work with the Power Editor. I’ll walk you through the basic features to help you understanding how this amazing tool works.

Next, I’ll show you step-by-step how to create campaigns, ad sets and ads. No matter what your campaign objective will be, you’ll always have to take these steps!

Last but not least, I’ll show you 10 cool features and strategies to manage and organize your campaigns like a pro. We’ll cover features like tags, filters, search, revert & delete, duplicating and bulk editing.

By the end of this course, you’ll understand how to work with the Power Editor in 2016 and create performance-driven campaigns almost instantly!
title: Facebook Marketing: Introduction To Power Editor
